scripts.setup: pnpm i && pnpm run rebuild && git config --local core.hooksPath .githooks && pnpm run setup:db && pnpm run setup:api
scripts.release:patch: pnpm run tag:web patch && pnpm run tag:api patch && pnpm run git:push
scripts.release:minor: pnpm run tag:web minor && pnpm run tag:api minor && pnpm run git:push
scripts.release:major: pnpm run tag:web major && pnpm run tag:api major && pnpm run git:push
scripts.stg-release:patch: pnpm run tag:web patch stg && pnpm run tag:api patch stg && pnpm run git:push
scripts.stg-release:minor: pnpm run tag:web minor stg && pnpm run tag:api minor stg && pnpm run git:push
scripts.stg-release:major: pnpm run tag:web major stg && pnpm run tag:api major stg && pnpm run git:push
